title: Ticket #7819: Enable Ornithology tests on MacOS X
description:
The Ornithology tests are currently disabled on MacOS X, mostly because testing on the platform was not in good enough shape at the time of the merge to tell how well things were going.

The MacOS X tests started failing after [60471]; Jaime has investigated and that commit may have unmasked a race condition in #7502 (instead of being problematic in and of itself).

This ticket is not intended to track the effort to resolve the current MacOS x testing woes, but for any additional Ornithology-specific effort that may be required.
creator: tlmiller
